definitions.definition: A track cycling relay race in which team members take turns while racing round the track for the largest number of laps , and exchange places with a team mate by means of a touch, which may be a push or a hand-sling .

main_definition: ( cycle racing ) A track cycling relay race in which team members take turns while racing round the track for the largest number of laps , and exchange places with a team mate by means of a touch, which may be a push or a hand-sling .
secondary_definitions: ( dance ) A form of line dance .
